Comments_List: The essential knowledge of multi variables
Some useful methods to do multi-variable calculus.

A course with this much material is difficult to do well in 5 weeks, but Itziar did a fantastic job. She cares about her students, and went out of her way to make herself available during office hours, before exams, and even when she was away for a conference.

the lecturer is good
problemset is appropriate

It is very effective and intense 
I like it very much 
It has a lot exercise  to do and we have time to discuss questions which is really nice.
Strength: students can actively participate in the class, especially in workshops; there are many resources for students to practice, like ximera.
The course material was excellent and was presented well by the instructor.
I would recommend this course to any student who wants to continue their study of calculus, and as a way into higher mathematics.
